casebody.data:
[Civ. No. 7370. Second Appellate District, Division Two. May 18, 1931.] THE CITY OF LOS ANGELES (a Municipal Corporation), Appellant, v. SADIE D. GRIFFITH ABBOTT et al., Defendants; RAY NATHANSON, Respondent.

Erwin P. Werner, City Attorney, and Arthur Loveland and Arthur W. Nordstrom, Deputies City Attorney, for Appellant.

Meserve & Meserve for Respondent.

THOMPSON (IRA F.), J.

This is an appeal from an order denying a motion to tax costs, in which all the material facts and questions of law are identical with those of City of Los Angeles v. Sadie D. Griffith Abbott, Julia Fanta, etc., et al., Respondents (No. 7369), ante, p. 180 [299 Pac. 807], this day decided. The same disposition should be made of the instant case.

Order affirmed.

Works, P. J., and Craig, J., concurred.
